Title: Headphones for Protection, Not Cranking It Up
Abstract: The 3M Tekk Protection WorkTunes headphones keep excessive noise out, and won't damage your ears with loud music levels, either.

Title: A Start-Up Matures, Working With AmEx
Abstract: American Express cardholders will receive discounts at certain shops and restaurants on their cellphone through an alliance with Foursquare.

Title: Amgen to Cut Jobs, a First for the Biotech Giant
Abstract: The company moved to cut costs in the face of declining sales of the anemia drugs that account for nearly half its revenue.

Title: How China Built 'iPhone City' With Billions in Perks for Apple's Partner
Abstract: A hidden bounty of benefits for Foxconn's plant in Zhengzhou, the world's biggest iPhone factory, is central to the production of Apple's most profitable product.
